chunks.chunk_text: John, where's your brother?How about going to movie?Sure, the music was great.I like jogging, hiking and dancing.I still have ten more minutes to play.Excuse me, is this seat taken?歡迎收聽奇冰老師的超級英語通Welcome to English All Pass with Kenneth Chee
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Heavy Rainfall and Flooding Weather Report_ Dangerous Conditions P.json

chunks.chunk_text: Hello everyone, welcome to News English All PassMy name is Kenneth Chee歡迎收聽新聞英語通,我是奇冰老師In this unit, we'll be learning about some news這個單元裡,我們要來學習的是新聞英語So first, let's listen to today's news首先,讓我們來聽一下今天的新聞
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Heavy Rainfall and Flooding Weather Report_ Dangerous Conditions P.json

chunks.chunk_text: Heavy rainfall and flooding weather reportDangerous conditions persistOur region is struggling with a severe weather eventas heavy rainfall continues to flood the arearesulting in widespread floodingand dangerous conditionsIntense and relentless rainfall over the past several dayshas led to rising water levels in rivers, streams and urban areas
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Heavy Rainfall and Flooding Weather Report_ Dangerous Conditions P.json

chunks.chunk_text: causing significant floodingMany regions are strugglingwith rapidly rising floodwatersthat are flooding homes, roads and businessesEmergency services are working diligentlyto rescue residents strandedby the rising watersand provide assistance to affected communitiesEvacuations are ongoing in some areaswhere the flood risk is particularly high
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Heavy Rainfall and Flooding Weather Report_ Dangerous Conditions P.json

chunks.chunk_text: 好,那我們趕快來看一下這篇新聞的重點Our region is struggling with a severe weather eventas heavy rainfall continues to flood the arearesulting in widespread flooding
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Heavy Rainfall and Flooding Weather Report_ Dangerous Conditions P.json

chunks.chunk_text: and dangerous conditions我們的地區目前,我們的地區正掙扎於嚴峻的氣候事件由於好雨持續淹沒這個區域,造成了大規模的淹水以及危險的情況Struggle 是一個動詞叫掙扎Severe 是一個形容詞就是嚴重的Weather event 就是天氣事件
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Heavy Rainfall and Flooding Weather Report_ Dangerous Conditions P.json

chunks.chunk_text: Flood 在這裡當作是動詞就是淹沒是淹水Resulting in 在文法上我們稱它叫分詞構句Widespread flooding 就是很多地方都淹水大規模的淹水接著稍微做進一步的說明
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Heavy Rainfall and Flooding Weather Report_ Dangerous Conditions P.json

chunks.chunk_text: Streams and urban areascausing significant flooding在過去幾天中強烈而不間斷的降雨造成了河流、溪水還有都市地區水位不斷的上升導致嚴重的水災Intense 是一個形容詞就是強烈的Relentless 是一個形容詞指的是持續強烈的
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Heavy Rainfall and Flooding Weather Report_ Dangerous Conditions P.json

chunks.chunk_text: 所以這邊就是說大雨不斷的一直下Rising water levels 指的就是水位不斷的上升Urban areas 指的是城市地區causing significant flooding這個地方它又是分詞構句
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Heavy Rainfall and Flooding Weather Report_ Dangerous Conditions P.json

chunks.chunk_text: Flood waters 指的就是淹水
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Heavy Rainfall and Flooding Weather Report_ Dangerous Conditions P.json

chunks.chunk_text: 來拯救受困於水中的居民並且對受影響的社區提供協助這邊Resident 是名詞是居民後面的Stranded by the rising waters這個地方是分詞片語修飾前面的ResidentProvide assistance to 這個片語是指對誰提供協助
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Heavy Rainfall and Flooding Weather Report_ Dangerous Conditions P.json

chunks.chunk_text: Evacuations are ongoing in some areas where the flood risk is particularly high在一些水災風險非常高的地區正在持續撤離中
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Heavy Rainfall and Flooding Weather Report_ Dangerous Conditions P.json

chunks.chunk_text: Language Focus 學習焦點
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Heavy Rainfall and Flooding Weather Report_ Dangerous Conditions P.json

chunks.chunk_text: 先來看一下句型它是一個主要詞句寫完了 逗號後面如果這個動作是主動的我們就會用VING現在分詞來表示這是一種簡化的句法說起來比較簡潔來看一下文中的例子
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Heavy Rainfall and Flooding Weather Report_ Dangerous Conditions P.json

chunks.chunk_text: 這裡Resulting in widespread flooding指的就是前面豪雨持續就會導致大規模的水災以及危險的情況再看一個例句湯姆在公園走著 想著剛剛發生的事
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Heavy Rainfall and Flooding Weather Report_ Dangerous Conditions P.json

chunks.chunk_text: 是思考的所以我們就用thinkingWords and phrases 詞彙片語
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Heavy Rainfall and Flooding Weather Report_ Dangerous Conditions P.json

chunks.chunk_text: Sever 形容詞非常嚴重的 慘重的Widespread 形容詞廣泛的 普遍的Intense 形容詞強烈的 極度的Relentless 形容詞持續嚴厲的 持續強烈的Stream
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Heavy Rainfall and Flooding Weather Report_ Dangerous Conditions P.json

chunks.chunk_text: 小河 溪流Urban 形容詞城市的 城鎮的Emergency Services 名詞緊急服務機構Diligently 副詞勤奮的 認真的Rescue 動詞救援 解救Resident 名詞居民 住戶

chunks.chunk_text: Stranded 形容詞滯留的 被困住的Provide 動詞提供 供給Assistance 名詞幫助 協助Affected 形容詞受到影響的Particularly 副詞特別 有其
